info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 2 at 9:17PM CDT until July 3 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
...Minor flooding occurring for the following rivers in Texas...
Rio Grande below Rio Conchos near Presidio, Texas affecting Presidio County.
For the Rio Grande...including Rio Grande above Rio Conchos near Presidio, Texas, Rio Grande at Presidio Vehicle Bridge, Rio Grande below Rio Conchos near Presidio, Texas, Rio Grande near Castolon, Texas, Rio Grande at Johnson Ranch near Castolon, Texas, Rio Grande at Rio Grande Village, BBNP, Texas, Rio Grande near Dryden, Texas, Terlingua Creek near Terlingua, Texas...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Rio Grande below Rio Grande below Rio Conchos near Presidio, Texas.
* WHEN...Until Thursday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet (2.7 meters), the river reaches minor flood stage, and low lying areas begin to flood. At 11.0 feet (3.4 meters), minor flooding continues along the river. Irrigation pumps may need to be removed. No threats to residences or other structures are known to occur.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.0 feet (3.0 meters). - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet (2.4 meters). - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Wednesday was 10.2 feet (3.1 meters). - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by early Thursday morning and continue falling to 4.0 feet (1.2 meters) Monday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet (2.7 meters). - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/maf.
The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 700 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING
